item.title: Pacemaker Tutorial
item.description: Pacemaker Tutorial MISC CRM Commands 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 $ # You can set a node to standby mode, $ # which can be used to simulate a node becoming unavailable, $ # with this command: $ sudo crm node standby NodeName $ # You can change a nodeâ€™s status from standby $ # to online with this command: $ sudo crm node online NodeName
